problem_text: Triangle L M N is equilateral, and M P bisects L N. Find the measure of the side of \triangle L M N.
compact_text: Triangle LMN is equilateral, and MP bisects LN. Find the measure of the side of \triangle LMN.
annotat_text: Triangle $LMN$ is equilateral, and $\overline{MP}$ bisects $\overline{LN}$. Find the measure of each side of $\triangle LMN$.
